channel.description: Recent content in AWS on AgileSyndro.me

item.title: 1998 is calling, and it wants a website
item.description: It’s 1998 and the local robotics club wants a website. You’ve got this, you know HTML, some simple JavaScript and how to use Windows Paint to re-size images. The website design isn’t the problem, it never really is. Now comes the hard part, let’s get our web server up and running: Red Hat 5.2 Apache v1.3 DNS A Record FTP Server for transfering the files But let’s not forget what you had to tell the team:
